name: The Energy Cycle
description:
*Note : Needs WebGL 2.0 to run. Play in Firefox or Chrome. Or just download the PC build*

Help Diphos gain energy for another round of work at the Nucleus, in this short narrative adventure.

The cycle of life needs energy. The Krebs Cycle has been generating energy inside of cells for hundreds of millions of years. A number of enzymes must act in sequence to keep everything running.

Credits:
Abhishek Khade - 3D Art
Achintya Bisht - 2D Art
Sri Ganesh - Shaders and Post Processing
Ujwal Kumar - Code and Music

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3
